name: Branches Away
description:
Made for TriJam # 182.

Theme is Branches Away.

I took branches as in trees and away as in going out or up, so I created a vertical scroller where the aim is to get as high as possible in the tree.

Keys are left and right only.

Springs boost you higher.

Watch out for other birds.

NB: Bug with the scoring ran out of time to fix.

Animal assets by Kenney.

Vector art by me.

Sound effects from Zapsplat.

Game idea based on Doodle Jump
